          <title>
            <string language="en">The blacksmith</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Schmied</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le forgeron</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ferreiro</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a blacksmith hammering red-hot iron.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Schmied, der red-hot 
Eisen hammert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un forgeron martelant le
fer d'un rouge ardent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um ferreiro que martela o
ferro red-hot.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un fabbro che martella
il ferro rovente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει έναν σιδηρουργό που 
σφυρηλατεί τον red-hot σίδηρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a herrero que martilla
